markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Boulderhead Bock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=843)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 29</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Players can gain access to faction-specific gear by taking the corresponding Faction Gear Access Game Reward, available when they reach 20 reputation with the respective faction._

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

No one is sure if Gorm brews this malty ale himself, but it seems to be an off-duty favorite of the Grand Archive faction leader. The brew packs a heavy punch, and while Gorm officially discourages drinking on the job, boulderhead bock does makes the drinker more self-assured and protects them from conditions that would addle their mental faculties. For 1 hour, you gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against effects that would make you [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) or [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37). However, you also become less aware of your surroundings, taking a –2 item penalty to Perception for 1 hour.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Boulderhead Bock

Activate Single Action Interact --- No one is sure if Gorm brews this malty ale himself, but it seems to be an off-duty favorite of the Grand Archive faction leader. The brew packs a heavy punch, and while Gorm officially discourages drinking on the job, boulderhead bock does makes the drinker more self-assured and protects them from conditions that would addle their mental faculties. For 1 hour, you gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against effects that would make you stunned or stupefied. However, you also become less aware of your surroundings, taking a –2 item penalty to Perception for 1 hour.
